channel.title: The Disciple (Neutral Killer)
channel.description:
Ascended (Passive) - Immune to occupation, conversation, and death. Well Regarded (Passive) - Will appear as blue dragon to all investigative classes in the first 3 nights.
Shame (Day): Silence a player for a day, as well as disabling all day and night abilities [1 Use] God's Power (Day): Bypass Death Immunity [2 Uses]
God's Wrath (Night): Kill A Player [Infinite Uses] God's Will (Night): Control one player's action onto you, target will not be informed. [2 uses]

item.title: The Disciple (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Enchiladas
item.description:
This ability gives you claim room, and can drive suspicion away from you

Read full topic

item.title: The Disciple (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Sam17z
item.description:
Enchiladas:

God’s Will (Night): Control one player’s action onto you, target will not be informed. [2 uses]

When would this be useful? This class is immune to death so healers and knights won’t be useful; I do not know how I would use this in game.

Read full topic

item.title: The Disciple (Neutral Killer)
item.dc:creator: Enchiladas
item.description:
Ascended (Passive) - Immune to occupation, conversation, and death.
Well Regarded (Passive) - Will appear as blue dragon to all investigative classes in the first 3 nights.

Shame (Day): Silence a player for a day, as well as disabling all day and night abilities [1 Use]
God’s Power (Day): Bypass Death Immunity [2 Uses]

God’s Wrath (Night): Kill A Player [Infinite Uses]
God’s Will (Night): Control one player’s action onto you, target will not be informed. [2 uses]

Read full topic
